General.Name: Landmark Cars Limited
General.Description: Landmark Cars Limited engages in the automotive retail business in India. The company provides dealership services for Mercedes-Benz, Honda, Jeep, Volkswagen, Renault, and BYD; and Ashok Leyland commercial vehicles. It also offers car accessories and merchandise products; and after-sales, pre-sales consultation, roadside assistance, insurance, and financing services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
